string.text: The OTs-04 knife was developed at the Tula Central Design Research Bureau (TsKIB) in the late 80s - early 90s and was intended for special forces of the Interior Ministry troops.
This is a special blade made of high-carbon steel with excellent cutting and chopping properties. Ideal for cutting mutants of all stripes, and for protection against them.

[RUSSIAN ACCENT "ON"] It is rumoured, these blades are produced in very a few by masters from a groupment Monolith. Threw composition of alloy not known - it is talked to extract him it is possible only in the heart of sarcophagus.[RUSSIAN ACCENT "OFF"]
Tactical tomahawk, multi-tool and breaching tool, all-in-one solution.
